casebody.data:
Samuel J. RAWAK, Appellee, v. MARION DE VRIES, Inc., Appellant. No. 235. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 4, 1935. Weinberg & Weinberg, of New York City (Basil O’Connor and Reuben Weinberg, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Martin Berlin, of New York City (Isidor E. Schlesinger, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment and order affirmed.
